org.exolab.jms.jndiadministration
Class QueryDialog

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.exolab.jms.jndiadministration.QueryDialog
public class QueryDialog
extends java.lang.Object

A generic query dialaog, used to confirm all add/delete operations. The class is just a wrapper around a JOptionMenuPane .

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $ $Date: 2003/08/17 01:32:24 $
Author:
Jim Mourikis
See Also:
